resources.string:
A Centre of Relevance and Excellence (CORE) has been set up at Thapar University by TIFAC Mission REACH of Department of Science and Technology, Govt. of India in its first phase of setting up eight CORES at various Institutes and Universities spread all over the country.
Science and Technology Entrepreneur\'s Park (STEP) has been established jointly by Thapar University and DST, Govt. of India. Thapar University has impressively grown in size and activities during the last five decades of its existence. Nearly 10,500 engineers have left its portals so far, distinguishing themselves as proud Thaparians in diverse fields in our country and aboard. As a fitting recognition of its pioneering role in promoting the growth and development both at National and International levels.

Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) is defined as the voluntary activities undertaken by us to operate in an economic, social and environmentally sustainable manner. ANUBHAV In this we are going to make packages for "School students" in which they will be shown "SHAURYA GATHA", "DRDO" Techniques so that they can know more about the soldiers and their techniques and performances by specially abled students So that they can be motivated by the hidden talent of the students. JASHNA Festival is an occasion of celebration and sharing the joy with others. With an intent to share the festivity of Aranya and to give a feeling of joy to underprivileged children we propose to initiate a first of its kind event in Thapar University. A fun filled event for the kids associated with YU and Pratigya, where they can also share the feel of our festival. This is for the first time in Aranya when we are trying to light up the lives of these children and making them a part of Aranya.
Some of the events of JASHNA - Exhibition visits. - Performances by children. - Refreshments. - Dance Party.

Aranya is the annual technical festival of Thapar University, Patiala (India) Aranya is a three day long extravaganza that aims to bring the best talents from all over northern India to one platform. Starting in 2006, the golden jubilee year of the university, Aranya has gained more and more popularity overtime. The festival is generally held in the months of October-November each year. It draws the attention of many colleges as well as school students from all over India. Aranya 2014 have everything it takes to truly take India to a next level.Students from all around the nation compete with each other to achieve excellence.It will be a blend of Tech Events,Workshops,Guest Lecture,Awareness campaign(swachh bharat) and Sports activity.Then after the day of hardwork we enjoy at night through various performances by some of the best in the business.

Gurdas Maan is an Indian singer, songwriter, choreographer, and actor. He is considered one of the most notable figures in the world of Punjabi music. He was born in Giddarbaha village of the Indian state of Punjab and gained national attention in 1980 with the song "Dil Da Mamla Hai." Since then, he has gone on to record over 34 albums and has written over 305 songs. In 2013 he announced the launch of his YouTube channel to stay connected with his fans via video blogs and old as well as new music videos.

BRIGADIER (Dr.) S S PARMAR (Former Deputy Director General Military Training Director, Integrated HQ of Ministry of Defence) is a qualified Psychologist from Defence Institute of Psychological Research, New Delhi is instrumental in slection of candidates aspirant to become officers in the Indian Armed Forces at different Services Selection Board (SSB\'s). During his service he also imparted professional training to Gentlemen Cadets at Indian Military Academy, Dehradun and Officer\'s Training Academy, Chennai as well as organized Personality Development Programmes/Courses at various Human Resource Development Centers of the Indian Army. A highly motivated, seasoned multifunctional expert with over 3 decades of comprehensive experience in leadership positions in the Indian Army. Successful track record in organizing training and development sessions for army officials as well civilians to upgrade their professional skills. Proven Strength in designing and implementing innovative HR policies. Dynamic team leader with innate capability to enthuse team members to generate exemplary performance. Effective administrator with extensive experience in ensuring continuous availability of facilities and managing logistics in huge Army/Civil educational establishment.
